data.title: Emily Penrose Design
data.meta_description: Emily Penrose is a London based Interior Design company specialising in commercial and residential, bringing to life combinations of vairous styles & eras.
data.text:
Project Management

Project Management by Emily Penrose Design and Canham & Hart.

A Classic London Townhouse Apartment Gets a Glamorous Art Deco-Inspired Makeover.

This West London home combines old-school glamour and hotel luxe thanks to the exacting vision of its creative owner.

Inspired by her favourite London hotels, the master bedroom in Elspeth Lynn’s London townhouse apartment combines functionality and old school glamour with a palette of restful caramels and golds. A partially mirrored wall divider acts as a handy storage and dressing area. “I designed a place for every single thing, as I believe that tidiness is easier to achieve if the right storage is at hand,” says Lynn.
